column2: The End of the Treasure Fleet

The Dragon Throne stands empty, and [treasure_fleet_sender.GetBestName]'s Treasure Fleet has ceased to have a purpose, seeing as there is no imperial dynasty that can show off its might.\nShould a new ruler successfully claim the Mandate of Heaven and the Dragon Throne, a new Treasure Fleet might be dispatched to show the might of the new imperial dynasty, assuming the new Son of Heaven sees it as a worthy endeavour.
To be expected...
I should see to matters at home...
The End of the Treasure Fleet

[eoc.GetBestName] now sits on the Dragon Throne, but [eoc.GetSheHe] has not seen fit to claim the Mandate of Heaven. As a result, the Treasure Fleet no longer serves a purpose, seeing as it is a symbol of the might of the imperial dynasty.\nShould [eoc.GetBestName] or [eoc.GetHerHis] successors see fit to claim the Mandate of Heaven and [eoc.GetHerHis] position as the [eoc.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven, [eoc.GetSheHe] might also see fit to dispatch a new Treasure Fleet to show of the might of [eoc.GetHerHis] imperial dynasty.
So much for that...
I suppose I should head home...
This suits me just fine!
First the Dragon Throne, then the Treasure Fleet...
The End of the Treasure Fleet

[eoc.GetBestName], the [eoc.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven, now sits on the Dragon Throne, and [eoc.GetSheHe] has thus successfully claimed the Mandate of Heaven from [treasure_fleet_sender.GetBestName]'s imperial dynasty. As such, it is clear that the Treasure Fleet that was meant to display the might of [treasure_fleet_sender.GetBestName]'s imperial dynasty serves no purpose.\nPerhaps the new [eoc.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven will see fit to dispatch a new Treasure Fleet, though as [eoc.GetHerHis] dynasty might last for ten thousand years such an endeavour might not be undertaken for some time.
I see...
Very well...
An intriguing idea...
Is there no end to the bad news?
The End of the Treasure Fleet

It is known that [eoc.GetBestName] does not care for the Mandate of Heaven despite possessing the Dragon Throne, and as the Treasure Fleet is a symbol of the imperial dynasty's might and the [eoc.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven's rightful claim to possess the Mandate it no longer serves a purpose.\nShould [eoc.GetBestName] or [eoc.GetHerHis] successors see fit to claim the Mandate of Heaven, they might of course order the undertaking of a new Treasure Fleet expedition, but for the time being such things are not to be expected.
Interesting...
I guess it is time to head home...
The Mandate of Heaven is too much trouble...
The End of the Treasure Fleet

For one reason or another, the Treasure Fleet and its voyage have become unfeasible. Perhaps a new expedition might be undertaken in the future, should the Dragon Throne see it as a worthwhile endeavour.
Curious...
I need to go home...
Well, that's that...

I have finally returned home from the long voyage I undertook as part of the Treasure Fleet. I might need some time to get used to being at home once again, seeing as I have been away for some time, but it feels good to be home.
I wonder what I have missed...

My ship has finally returned following the unexpected end of the Treasure Fleet's voyage. I might need some time to get used to being at home once again, seeing as I have been away for some time, but it feels good to be home.
Not the way I expected to return...

I had expected my return home to be rather more triumphant when I left aboard one of the Treasure Fleet's ships, but [treasure_fleet_invader.GetBestName]'s sudden yet inevitable betrayal put an end to that, and I was lucky to escape death or captivity at [treasure_fleet_invader.GetHerHis] hands.
That went... poorly...
